 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרִיג‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Gen.40.10|Gen 40:10]]</sup> ==tendril, twig== (from ***interlacing***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> palm-leaf ***braid***, etc.; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***net*** ([[BDB#Prä|Prä]]<sup>BASi. 371</sup>); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְרִיגָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***network, lattice***); — of vine, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרִיגִם‎</span> [[Gen.40.10|Gen 40:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרִגִים‎</span> v[[Gen.40.12|Gen 40:12]] of fig-tree, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרִיגֶיהָ‎</span> [[Joel.1.7|Joel 1:7]].
